original_title: João Bénard da Costa: Outros Amarão as Coisas Que Eu Amei
overview: Director Manuel Mozos draws an intimate portrait of João Bénard da Costa, programmer, critic, actor and, for 18 years, director of the Portuguese Film Museum, who passed away in 2009.
title: João Bénard da Costa: Others Will Love the Things I Have Loved
